title: Foreign exchange rates
content:
KARACHI, Sep 22 (APP):The Exchange Rates Committee of Financial Markets Association of Pakistan issued the following Exchange rates bulletin, here on Monday.
CONVERSION RATES FOR SEPTEMBER 22, 2025 FOR FOREIGN CURRENCY FOR FORWARD COVER FOR DPOSITS (EXCLUDING FE 25 DEPOSITS)
SBP SETTLEMENT VALUE DATE SEPTMBER 24, 2025
